overview:
Dave Stein is a Behance co-founder and technology lead.

He has been involved with web development for over thirteen years. Four of those years was spent freelancing. During this time he made over 100 websites from scratch with the help of his design partner, Nic Climer.

He then joined up with Scott Belsky and Matias Corea to found Behance where he has been since 2007. Since that time he has had a major hand in all Behance’s online products and services.
